arts.ttl: Burnley 1-1 Nottingham Forest: Burnley player ratings
arts.sum: The Burnley captain put in yet another solid display with his passing ability and his defensive contributions being crucial for Burnley picking up a point. But the most impressive part of his performance came around the 70th minute mark as he got himself in a foot race with Callum Hudson-Odoi who hadn't been on the field for long so still had fresh legs.

arts.ttl: Ange Postecoglou off the mark as Nottingham Forest boss with draw at Burnley
arts.sum: Neco Williams scored after only two minutes but Jaidon Anthony earned Burnley a point.

arts.ttl: Postecoglou's winless woes continue as Nottingham Forest draw with Burnley
arts.sum: Ange Postecoglou's winless woes continue on Saturday afternoon as Nottingham Forest are held to a 1-1 draw by newly-promoted Burnley in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Burnley vs Nottingham Forest – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Burnley and Nottingham Forest clash in a crucial Premier League encounter at Turf Moor on Saturday, with both struggling sides desperate for a victory. The match pits a Burnley team whose encouraging performances have been undone by heartbreaking late defeats against a Forest side in turmoil. New manager Ange Postecoglou is already under pressure after […] The post Burnley vs Nottingham Forest – Match Preview and Team News first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: November Premier League fixtures shift for TV coverage, UEFA duties, and midweek drama
arts.sum: Key kick-offs move for Sky and TNT Sports broadcasts, with clubs like Villa, Palace, and Forest rescheduled due to Europa ties. Updated match times keep fans tuned in all month.

arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest looking to achieve club first in Burnley Premier League fixture
arts.sum: Nottingham Forest will be bidding to achieve a club first when they square off against Burnley in the Premier League on Saturday afternoon.

arts.ttl: All 10 Premier League weekend games predictions - Week 5
